document_data.mainbody:
hop Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep during the 15 century DR.
Chop Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeeps Field Ward. It was one of the larger roads found in this section of the Field Ward, running east to west in between the High Road and Gawenknife Street. Chop Street was also connected with the Fieldway, Stench Alley, and Leanwall Alley.
